content.rendered:
MELPe codec for low power and low bitrate mobile applications, VoIP & radio

Compandent new Android MELPe demo application was released! MELPe codec for low power and low bitrate mobile applications, VoIP & radio, was highly optimized for 64-bit ARMv8 and 32-bit ARMv7 with DSP extensions, as well as many DSP, Intel, ADI processors.
https://www.compandent.com/mobileapp/
